fields.comment: NOTE( Petri ): 15.8.2023 - if this is set to true, will only spray dynamic materials, that dont cause bugs (i.e. will not spray hard rock, box2d materials)
fields.name: dont_spray_static_materials

fields.comment: NOTE( Petri ): 15.8.2023 - if this is set to true, will only leak gas materials instead of 'spraying' them.
fields.name: dont_spray_just_leak_gas_materials

fields.comment: Petri: body_colored didn't seem to work, so I added never_color. It can be set to true if you never want the potion to be colored
fields.name: never_color

fields.comment: if set, will always use the color from this material
fields.name: custom_color_material
